question: Who among the following is the first woman who won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1905?
explanation: Baroness Bertha Sophie Felicita von Suttner was the first woman who won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1905. She was an Austrian. She was the honorary President of Permanent International Peace Burea, Switzerland. She wrote one of the 19th century's most influential books "Lay Down Your Arms". It is an anti-war novel.
